alert.note: Alert for De Baca; Guadalupe (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 4:51PM MDT until May 01 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL DE BACA AND SOUTHEASTERN GUADALUPE COUNTIES... At 450 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Sumner Lake, or 17 miles west of Fort Sumner, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Sumner, Sumner Lake State Park and Sumner Lake. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 313 and 326. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
